content:
Welcome to my webpage! I am a Reasearch Assistant at ETH Zurich, Computer Vision and Geometry Lab. I graduated with a MSc in Computer Science from ETH Zurich. While completing this program, I have interned at Swisscom as a Software Engineer.
  Download my CV
